description: Circular Construction Governance Knowledge Graph — Multi-Country Schema

Instrument.description: Named policy, law, standard, guideline, framework, or code

Authority.description: Named organisation that creates, administers, or enforces instruments

Jurisdiction.description: Geographic or political area where instruments apply

Requirement.description: Specific obligation, mandate, or criterion within an instrument

Practice.description: Specific action, method, or approach in construction/deconstruction

MaterialAsset.description: Specific material, component, waste stream, or physical resource

Stakeholder.description: Category of actor (person/organisation role) in the domain

Enabler.description: Specific factor that facilitates or supports a practice

OutcomeMetric.description: Specific measurable result, target, or KPI

extraction_pipeline.method: Three-pass LLM extraction with entity registry
